name: Chronicle Collection Scented Candle – Ambre Brûlée
description: Escape to golden hour in sun-soaked souks with this sweet amber-rich fragrance, which cloaks the senses in warmth. Rich and soothing in equal measure, with bergamot to relieve stress and fight infection, it's perfect for bringing positive energy. Made by the world's oldest active candle manufacturer, Cire Trudon, it is crafted using meticulous production techniques and zero artificial ingredients to ensure a clean, smoke-free burn. Scent includes notes of amber, patchouli and bergamot.
